trans-unit.source: Provides a message property that contains correlation instance keys after applying the correlation calculation to a message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref> class using the specified correlation keys.
The instance key for the primary correlation.
Instance keys for additional correlations.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref> class.
The correlation key.
The additional keys.
The transient correlations.
Gets a collection that contains the additional instance keys for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>.
The additional instance keys.
Gets the primary correlation instance key for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>.
The primary correlation instance key.
Gets the name of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>.
The string value <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>.
Gets the collection of transient correlation instance key for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>.
The collection of transient correlation instance key.
Attempts to get a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref> from the specified message’s <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref>.
The message that contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref> to inspect.

When this method returns, contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref> contained the specified message’s <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref> if one is present; otherwise, `null`.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

`true` if the message’s <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>; otherwise; `false`.
Attempts to get the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref> from the specified message properties.
The message properties to inspect.
When this method returns, contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref> contained by the specified message properties if one is present; otherwise, `null`.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if the message properties contain a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationMessageProperty"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
